actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Natural Resources Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Natural Resources Development and Production

official_title: A bill to provide for the payment of interest on certain lease revenues paid to the Secretary of the Interior, to eliminate certain unnecessary reporting requirements, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Interior to pay interest on the refund of any monies that were paid to the Secretary as mineral revenues and that were determined not to be owing to the United States or to certain distributees. Sets guidelines for interest computation and for premature refunds. Amends the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act to repeal the requirement that refunds or credits of overpayments on leases be reported to the Congress for a 30-day review period.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the payment of interest on certain lease revenues paid to the Secretary of the Interior, to eliminate certain unnecessary reporting requirements, and for other purposes.
